name: Coordinated Management of Rate, Power and Carrier Sense Threshold for IEEE 802.11 Networks
tagline: NS3 Network Simulator with power control of WiFi transmissions. Implementation of different proposed mechanisms for joint rate, power and carrier sense threshold control.
body:
This project contains the NS3 Simulator and the implementations of different rate, power and carrier sense threshold control algorithms: PARF, APARF, Minstrel-Piano, RRPAA and PRCS for the NS3 simulator.
There is also included tests where this algorithms can be compared in different scenarios.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
